home.header: Simple, secure real estate transactions without the costs of agents.
home.description: is a free platform for buyers and sellers of real estate who are seeking a quick, transparent way to complete a transaction without the high costs of using a realtor.
home.lawyer: Our easy-to-understand language helps you generate a lawyer-reviewed Sales Agreement in minutes, making it simple for your preferred real estate attorney to finalize your sale.

seller.generateAgreement: I accept the terms and conditions.
